name: Gonzalo Rodríguez Canosa
body:
# what i can do

I am an autonomous and dedicated engineer with large experience working in robotic projects. 

My main research interests are:
- MultiRobot Systems.
- Mobile Robots.
- Aerial and ground vehicles.
- 3D sensors.

I have thoroughly used the following tools for different research projects:
- ROS.
- PCL (Point Cloud Library).
- OpenCV.
- C++.
http://es.linkedin.com/in/grcanosa/
